argument.description: Is an expression of a character string or binary data type. string_expression can be either character or binary data.

returnType: Returns the same type as string_expression.
description: Repeats a string value a specified number of times.
sample:
SELECT [Name]  
, REPLICATE('0', 4) + [ProductLine] AS 'Line Code'  
FROM [Production].[Product]  
WHERE [ProductLine] = 'T'  
ORDER BY [Name];  
GO
